about_the_game:
Overview:

Step into the paws of Calypso, a courageous dog on a quest to rescue her beloved princess, Aevnass, in Calypso's Calamity. This magical rogue-lite platformer takes you through a beautifully crafted world filled with dangerous enemies, powerful items, and haunting memories. Overcome obstacles, gather unique projectiles, transform into new forms and fight to save Aevnass from a dark and mysterious force.

As Aevnass is held captive by a sinister beast, her memories have been torn from her in a cruel attempt to bend her will. Calypso must navigate treacherous environments, collecting these memories to help restore Aevnass’s mind and free her from the beast’s influence.

Whether you're dodging fireballs, battling epic bosses, or navigating perilous environments, every run in Calypso's Calamity brings new challenges and opportunities for discovery.

The game’s magical atmosphere is brought to life through beautifully stylized art, an emotional soundtrack, and heart-pounding action. Calypso's Calamity offers an experience that is both challenging and rewarding, with every run offering a new opportunity to succeed.

Key Features:

  • Rogue-lite Platformer Action: Experience challenging platforming and fast-paced combat with randomized projectiles and items for each run.

  • Transformations: Unlock new forms for Calypso, each with unique abilities, to adapt to various enemies and environments.

  • Hand-Crafted Levels: Explore beautifully designed levels that offer unique challenges and obstacles.

  • Dynamic Combat: Engage in thrilling combat, face off against epic bosses, and use a variety of projectiles and power-ups that change with each run.

  • Collect Aevnass’s Memories: Gather memories that were torn from Aevnass in a sinister attempt to control her, and use them to restore her will.

  • Challenging Yet Rewarding: Death is not the end! Learn from each run and return stronger, mastering the gameplay as you progress.

  • Multiple Difficulty Modes: Choose Easy Mode for a more accessible experience, or test your skills in Hard Mode (~15-20 hours of gameplay), where every action counts.

  • Completion Timers: In Hard Mode, your best times for each level and the entire game are tracked, along with your total death count. Replay levels to beat your personal best or challenge your friends to see who can complete the game faster.

  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8500, Apple M1
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support
